alertDescription.value: the number of replicas is less than desired

query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_deployment_spec_replicas' and Val > 0 | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend deployment = tostring(Json.deployment) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_deployment_status_replicas_available' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend deployment = tostring(Json.deployment) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_deployment_spec_strategy_rollingupdate_max_unavailable' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend deployment = tostring(Json.deployment) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, RollingUpdateMaxUnavailable=Val, deployment, namespace)  on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, deployment, namespace | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Available=Val, RollingUpdateMaxUnavailable, deployment, namespace) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, deployment, namespace | where Available < RollingUpdateMaxUnavailable | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Replicas=Val, Available, RollingUpdateMaxUnavailable, deployment, namespace
